long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A choose-your-own adventure game! It's a text-based game based on old choose-your-path game adventure games and lets you pick different paths to find a happy ending! I will be updating stories and adding more different fun choose-your-own games! Stories are bundled in the extension and don't require a connection or account on any website.

Also Includes for programming exercises for myself, an insulter generator to annoy your friends with in a cruel, creative, playful, appropriate way! (will be updated to a more formated and fun way!)
